pages.text: Reinforced Track has a couple of benefits over Iron Track Type.$(li)It has a stronger blast resistance. (45, enough for TNT explosions)$(li)It's also 25% faster than the iron track type.

Compared to H.S. Track type, it is way slower, and way safer.$(br2)However, you should use place reinforced tracks on blast resistant blocks, since the track will always drop once the supporting block is removed.
